text: A number of ships have been named Black Watch including: * Black Watch (full rigged ship), a large sailing ship built in Windsor, Nova Scotia * a passenger ship launched in 1938 and used as a depot ship by the Kriegsmarine in World War II, she was sunk in 1945 * , a cruise ship launched in 1971 as Royal Viking Star she was renamed Black Watch in 1996 Category:Ship names
title: List of ships named Black Watch
